headline: Viatris Appoints Matthew J. Maletta as Chief Legal Officer
summary: Viatris Inc. (Nasdaq: VTRS) announced today that Matthew J. Maletta has been appointed Chief Legal Officer (CLO), effective February 9, 2026. The appointment follows the transition of the Company's current CLO, Brian Roman, after more than 20 years of exemplary service to Viatris and its predecessor company, Mylan. Roman, who has served in multiple leadership positions and played a key role in supporting the Company's operations, portfolio and growth initiatives, will stay on through April 1, 20
